results.p: A non-fungible token (NFT) is a unique digital identifier that is recorded on a blockchain and is used to certify ownership and authenticity.

results.p: Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) are assets like a piece of art, digital content, or video that have been tokenized via a blockchain.
